::: {.g-col-6}

Kenny joined the Michigan Alzheimer’s Disease Center in the summer of 2023 as a member of the data core team as a Data Analyst/Programmer. He earned his B.S. in Statistics from Virginia Tech in 2021 and an MPH in Global Health Epidemiology from the University of Michigan in 2023. Kenny’s role includes working with researchers and staff to improve data management processes and support data analysis, primarily working in R, REDCap, and Power Automate. He also helps support collaborative projects between the MADC and another research program at U-M, the RP-CNBI. Kenny is currently working on learning SQL and enjoys running in his free time.
